name: defined by ANSI ATIS-0300097%3A  Structure for the
title: COMMON
definition: Identification of Telecommunications Connections for the North American Telecommunications System or by  COMMON LANGUAGE in BR-795-450-100. A brie f  summary of the format can be found in ASOG Practice 000, Section 2.14.5.

validEntry.description: For identification of an unbundled multiplexer
transport or a high capacity facility to a HUB

validEntryNotes: Either Location A or Z must be 11 characters.
usageNotes:
Required when the ACT field is "N", "C", "D", "M" or "T", the second position of the TQ field is not "N" or "X", and the EOD USE field on the EOD Form is not "A". 
Prohibited when the second position of the TQ field is "N" or "X". 
Prohibited  w hen the EOD USE field on the EOD Form is "A". 
Otherwise optional.
